column5: Anyone ever fish Dogtooth Lake in Ontario? Any pointers on fishing the lake in mid-June? Thanks for the info.
I haven't been there but a friend of mine once got his limit of eyes one afternoon(there) just before a storm. Five eyes = 40# Yes I would like to know more about it also!!
I haven't been there but a friend of mine once got his limit of eyes one afternoon(there) just before a storm. Five eyes = 40# Yes I would like to know more about it also!!

Yes, We fish dogtooth every year for the past ten years. Great fishing lake once you get to know it. Very large lake with lots of bays. Early june we have found that the average eyes are in the weedy bays, and the bigger eyes are on flats in about 16 feet of water. We usaully use live bait (leeches-minnows)
Im going to dogtooth lk in june this year. would love to know where those weedy bays are
Do a search on Doogtooth Lake and there should be some helpful information. Billl Krejca
Jackfish Bay would be one of them Joe. We had pretty good success catching eater size fish pulling shallow shad raps there.

Forget the weedy bays, where are those 16' flats? In the bays as well or on main lake? I assume when you say flats, you mean there is deeper water around those flats or is it just the flats coming off the shorelines?
